item.title: Zipline 'total failure' led to fatal fall for tourist at Cape Tribulation, coroner hears
item.description: <p>Dean Anson Sanderson died at Cape Tribulation, 140km north of Cairns, on October 22, 2019 after falling 20 to 25 metres through a rainforest canopy from a zipline.</p>

item.title: Silicone mask, grenade, guns and 15k rounds of ammunition found stashed in storage unit in Sydney's south-west
item.description: <p>Police began an investigation on Monday after reports that firearms and ammunition were found inside a storage unit on a main road in Sydney&#x27;s south-west.</p>
